title: Lee Stafford Choco Locks Chocolate Shake Smoothing And Detangling Spray
features: This rich Duo formula creates soft, glossy, chocolate scented, tangle free hair
This leave-in Duo of mega oil and Magic moisture mixes to create smooth, soft, glossy and tangle free locks - simply shake to Awake
Enriched with cacao extract hair is left softened, deeply nourished and ultra glossy
Towel dried hair, comb through, leave in and watch hair go from wet to wow!
Fragranced with our scrumptiously chocolatey scent, your hair will smell (almost) good enough to eat! Your guilt free chocolate fix!
description: Wake and Shake! Ditch dull, dehydrated hair with this glow enhancing duo. Formulated with anti oxidising Cacao extract and rich caramel, this leave in conditioning spray transforms hair from wet to wow! A magic elixir for unloved locks, my CHoCo LoCKs CHoColate ShaKe leaves hair velvety smooth and instantly tangle free. For silky smooth and seriously glossy locks that smell good enough to eat... Chocolate just got serious! Top Tips From Lee: Shake to awake Apply 4-6 sprays to wet or dry hair Adjust according to length and thickness of hair Comb through and leave in
